data.comment: It is reported that 73288 spectators are in attendance today.
The match is underway in Manchester.
The match is underway in Manchester.
Man City's Sergio Aguero is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
Throw-in for Man City at Old Trafford.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In Manchester Man City's Ilkay Gundogan is caught offside.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Man City's Raheem Sterling is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Man Utd.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Man Utd's Daniel James gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Man City.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Anthony Martial (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd just outside Man City's area.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Man City's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Man City have a goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Man Utd's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Manchester Man Utd drive forward through Anthony Martial. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Man City.
At Old Trafford, Fernandinho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Man City's Rodri has been booked in Manchester.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Anthony Martial.
Bruno Fernandes with an assist there.
Man Utd are pushing forward but Bruno Fernandes's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Sergio Aguero is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Man City to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Man Utd.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Throw-in Man City.
Throw-in Man Utd.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Fred (Man Utd) gets a yellow card.
Mike Dean awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Old Trafford the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Man Utd.
Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Mike Dean blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Man City drive forward but Sergio Aguero is judged offside.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Anthony Martial for Man Utd who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man Utdâ€™s Anthony Martial is on his feet again at Old Trafford.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City pushes forward through Phil Foden, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Joao Cancelo (Man City) has received a first yellow card.
Gabriel Jesus is replacing Sergio Aguero for the away team.
Man City make their second substitution with Riyad Mahrez replacing Bernardo Silva.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Nicolas Otamendi (Man City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Man City's Phil Foden misses with an attempt on goal.
Mike Dean awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Can Man City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
Throw-in for Man City at Old Trafford.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Daniel James for Man Utd drives towards goal at Old Trafford. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Harry Maguire's header is off-target for Man Utd.
Man City have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luke Shaw.
Man Utd's Luke Shaw looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ilkay Gundogan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pep Guardiola (Man City) is making a third substitution, with Benjamin Mendy replacing Olexandr Zinchenko.
Eric Bailly is replacing Brandon Williams for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is making the team's second substitution at Old Trafford with Scott McTominay replacing Anthony Martial.
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Manchester.
Man City to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bruno Fernandes of Man Utd is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Man Utd.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Man Utd needs to be cautious. Man City have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Man City at Old Trafford.
The home team replace Bruno Fernandes with Odion Ighalo.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raheem Sterling for Man City drives towards goal at Old Trafford. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Man City.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nemanja Matic returns to the field for Man Utd after picking up a slight injury.
That's full-time at Old Trafford. The final score is 2-0.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Manchester to check on Nemanja Matic, who is grimacing with pain.
Harry Maguire is booked for the home team.
Goal! Scott McTominay extends Man Utd's lead to 2-0.
Gabriel Jesus (Man City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
